seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Sr Data Engineer' with 5+ years experience required and mentoring responsibilities for junior engineers

job_family.evidence: Title is Data Engineer with core focus on data pipelines, ETL workflows, and data warehousing

sub_specialty.evidence: Emphasis on 'data pipelines and ETL workflows' for 'large-scale data processing' with batch processing patterns, no streaming mentioned

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentions mentoring junior engineers and providing technical leadership, but no direct reports or hiring responsibilities mentioned

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS Redshift, Azure Synapse, and GCP BigQuery all mentioned with equal weight, no clear primary cloud emerges

secondary_clouds.evidence: Since primary cloud is multi-cloud approach, no additional secondary clouds beyond the three mentioned

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on 'data pipelines and ETL workflows' and 'large-scale data processing' with batch processing patterns, no real-time streaming mentioned

orchestrator_category.evidence: Apache Airflow explicitly mentioned as workflow orchestration tool

storage_layer.evidence: AWS Redshift, Azure Synapse, and GCP BigQuery are all data warehouse technologies, no data lake or lakehouse mentioned

remote_restriction.evidence: Onsite role in Denver, CO with 'no remote work' - requires being in the same metropolitan area

timezone_focus.evidence: Onsite role in Denver, CO with US-only restriction, no specific timezone requirements mentioned beyond location

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite role in Denver but no relocation package mentioned, implies candidates should already be in the area

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned in job posting, only E-Verify compliance stated

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Work authorization required mentioned without specific student visa support

citizenship_required.evidence: All qualified applicants considered with authorization to work in US required, no citizenship requirement specified

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position with comprehensive benefits package indicates W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: Extensive benefits including medical, dental, vision, life, disability, pet insurance, 401k, ESPP, HSA, FSA, paid time off, parental leave, training and tuition reimbursement

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'promotional opportunities' and 'career development support' but no specific career tracks or advancement paths detailed

mentorship_signals.evidence: Explicitly states 'Mentor and guide junior data engineers, providing technical leadership and career development support'

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: Mentions 'promotional opportunities' and career development support

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or lateral moves within the organization

career_tracks_available.evidence: While promotional opportunities are mentioned, no specific career tracks (IC vs management) are detailed

requirement_strictness.evidence: Mix of 'essential functions' (required) and 'preferred' qualifications like Master's degree and certifications, balanced approach

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined data engineering role with specific responsibilities, single clear focus not multi-role hybrid

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Senior-level requirements (5+ years, mentoring, technical leadership) are appropriate for senior data engineer position
